resources.string: Let\'s dive into Introduction and Objectives before we head to the Quiz.

League of Legends is a team-based strategy game where two teams of five powerful champions face off to destroy the otherâ€™s base. You get to choose from over 140 champions to make epic plays, secure kills, and take down towers as you battle your way to victory.

140+? that\'s a lot!!. I know and I am here to help you :). I have curated about 5 champions for each lane in summoner\'s rift. Let\'s first discuss the lanes so we can determine which one is the best fit for you!
------------Top lane:------------ It\'s primarily for tanky or durable champions known as top laners who excel at solo survival and one-on-one combat.
-------------Mid lane:------------- It\'s reserved for mages and assassins who excel in burst damage and can swiftly influence other parts of the map.
-------------Bot lane:------------- Played by ranged champions who aim to become powerful damage dealers in the later stages of the game.
------------Support:------------ Supports assist the AD Carry by providing protection, engaging enemies, and controlling vision on the map.
------------Jungle:------------ Junglers support lanes by clearing jungle camps for resources, controlling game objectives, and initiating surprise attacks (ganks).
Not gonna lie, but that was a lot of explanation. Now, let\'s head to the quiz :)
